a:6:{i:0;O:8:"stdClass":6:{s:5:"Field";s:2:"id";s:4:"Type";s:7:"int(11)";s:4:"Null";s:2:"NO";s:3:"Key";s:3:"PRI";s:7:"Default";N;s:5:"Extra";s:14:"auto_increment";}i:1;O:8:"stdClass":6:{s:5:"Field";s:8:"language";s:4:"Type";s:4:"text";s:4:"Null";s:2:"NO";s:3:"Key";s:0:"";s:7:"Default";N;s:5:"Extra";s:0:"";}i:2;O:8:"stdClass":6:{s:5:"Field";s:8:"spelling";s:4:"Type";s:4:"text";s:4:"Null";s:2:"NO";s:3:"Key";s:0:"";s:7:"Default";N;s:5:"Extra";s:0:"";}i:3;O:8:"stdClass":6:{s:5:"Field";s:6:"locale";s:4:"Type";s:4:"text";s:4:"Null";s:2:"NO";s:3:"Key";s:0:"";s:7:"Default";N;s:5:"Extra";s:0:"";}i:4;O:8:"stdClass":6:{s:5:"Field";s:10:"short_name";s:4:"Type";s:4:"text";s:4:"Null";s:2:"NO";s:3:"Key";s:0:"";s:7:"Default";N;s:5:"Extra";s:0:"";}i:5;O:8:"stdClass":6:{s:5:"Field";s:3:"rtl";s:4:"Type";s:10:"tinyint(1)";s:4:"Null";s:3:"YES";s:3:"Key";s:0:"";s:7:"Default";s:1:"0";s:5:"Extra";s:0:"";}}
